nodes.name: LendingPoolParametersProvider

nodes.documentation:
@dev initializes the LendingPoolParametersProvider after it's added to the proxy
@param _addressesProvider the address of the LendingPoolAddressesProvider
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @dev returns the maximum stable rate borrow size, in percentage of the available liquidity.*
nodes.name: getMaxStableRateBorrowSizePercent

nodes.documentation:
@dev returns the delta between the current stable rate and the user stable rate at
     which the borrow position of the user will be rebalanced (scaled down)*
nodes.name: getRebalanceDownRateDelta

nodes.documentation: @dev returns the fee applied to a flashloan and the portion to redirect to the protocol, in basis points.*
nodes.name: getFlashLoanFeesInBips
